extension_description.message: This is an unofficial extension adding the Yandex search provider

ya_search_description.message: Indicates that the Yandex Search Engine is set as a default search.

ya_fonts_description.message: Replace the YA font with classic Arail.

ya_font_size_description.message: Increase font size and spacing between paragraphs.

ya_side_panel_description.message: Turn off the right panel on the Yandex search result page.
